assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Confidence Petroleum India Limited manufactures and sells liquefied petroleum gas (LPG) cylinders in India. It operates through LPG/CNG Cylinder Manufacturing and LPG Bottling & Marketing segments. The company also offers CNG and packed cylinders. It also provides LPG bottling services; and supplies LPG for commercial usage. The company serves commercial and industrial customers under the GoGas, and retail customer under the GoGas Elite brand names. It operates approximately 209 auto LPG dispensing stations. Confidence Petroleum India Limited was founded in 1993 and is based in Nagpur, India.
